name: Survival of the Fittest (liver man)
description:
It is the year 2047, and the bugs of Planet Earth have militarized to win inter-species conflicts. Your intention is to hold off and advance towards hordes of enemies.

CONTROLS:
W/D - Movement
LMB - Shoot
Escape - Pause

MUSIC CREDIT:
Music credit goes to the Wowie Asset Pack. This asset pack was allowed during the Wowie 2.0 Game Jam.

Submitted for the Wowie 2.0 Game Jam.
